sentences.sContent: The last eruption of this volcano lasted over a year, so this cannot be ruled out.
sentences.sContent_eng: The last eruption of this volcano lasted over a year, so this cannot be ruled out.
sentences.sCn: 该火山上次爆发持续了一年，所以现在也不能排除这个可能性。

sentences.sContent: Our work was like that of geologists who compile the signs of an imminent earthquake or volcanic eruption.
sentences.sContent_eng: Our work was like that of geologists who compile the signs of an imminent earthquake or volcanic eruption.
sentences.sCn: 我们的工作如同地质学家，我们收集一场即将到来的地震或火山爆发的迹象。

sentences.sContent: If a volcanic eruption wipes out all of the plain mice, the island will be repopulated by striped mice.
sentences.sContent_eng: If a volcanic eruption wipes out all of the plain mice, the island will be repopulated by striped mice.
sentences.sCn: 假设一次火山爆发消灭了所有的普通老鼠，那么这个小岛将是斑纹鼠的天下。

synos.tran: [天]爆发，[地质]喷发；火山灰；出疹
